document.full_text: helped by muhammad ali's former trainer, britain's heavyweight wba champion david haye believes his speed and power will bring him victory in his unification bout with wladimir klitschko on july 2.
document.title: haye banks on power and speed to beat "boring" klitschko
lines_and_colors: helped by muhammad ali's former trainer, britain's heavyweight wba champion david haye believes his speed and power will bring him victory in his unification bout with wladimir klitschko on july 2.
